custom_css: .featured-products__list {display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center; align-items: stretch; gap: 20px;}

.featured-products__item {width: 45%; max-width: 375px; background: white; padding: 15px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out; margin: 10px;}
.featured-products__link {text-decoration: none; color: inherit; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;}
.featured-products__add-to-cart {margin-top: 10px; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #464B90; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 20px; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;}
